title: Three Broadway Girls (1932) Pre Code Comedy Film

sources.title: Three Broadway Girls (1932) Pre Code Comedy Film
sources.description:
Three former Broadway showgirls are looking to attract wealthy gentlemen for husbands.

aka: The Greeks Had a Word for Them
Director: Lowell Sherman
Writers: Zoe Akins, Sidney Howard 
Stars: Joan Blondell, Madge Evans, Ina Claire 
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Pre Code
